org.openscience.cdk.charges

Class Electronegativity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.charges.Electronegativity

  • public class Electronegativity
extends Object
    Calculation of the electronegativity of orbitals of a molecule by the method Gasteiger based on electronegativity is given by X = a + bq + c(q*q).
    Author:
    Miguel Rojas Cherto
    Source code:
    master
    Belongs to CDK module:
    charges
    Keywords:
    electronegativity
    Created on:
    2008-104-31
